short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your rewards for each transaction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peony Pocket recommendation engine would recommend a card from your wallet that would provide you with maximum rewards for the current spend so that you can shop in confidence knowing you would earn back with your rewards.
